sentences.en: All his decisions have been entirely governed by self-interest.
sentences.cn: 他的所有决定都受利己之心的支配。

sentences.en: And as far as the governing class made any pretensions to govern, they were ridiculous too.
sentences.cn: 自命有统治能力的统治阶级, 也可笑.

sentences.en: Britain was mandated to govern the former colony of German East Africa.
sentences.cn: 英国受权代管德国在东非的前殖民地.

sentences.en: Further, all the laws of nature that govern the particle motion are not known.
sentences.cn: 再者, 支配粒子运动的一切自然规律也都是未知的.

sentences.en: If we feared anything we could never govern England, my lord.
sentences.cn: 我们要是怕这怕那,就不可能统治英国了, 我的大人.

sentences.en: Man is so weak and inadequate that he is unable to govern himself.
sentences.cn: 人如此微弱与渺小,不能自治.

sentences.en: My nerves were so shaken that I could not govern my voice and conceal my agitation.
sentences.cn: 我简直是吓破了胆,已经无法控制自己的声音,也无法掩饰自己的紧张心情.

sentences.en: One can't completely govern one's thoughts at all times.
sentences.cn: 人不能始终控制得住自己的思想.

sentences.en: Prices are governed by market demand.
sentences.cn: 价格的高低取决于市场的需求。

sentences.en: So far, technology - based effluent limitations continue to govern discharges by industrial point sources.
sentences.cn: 至今, 以技术为基础的污水限制继续统管着工业污染源的排放.

sentences.en: The APA contains three standards of review that potentially can govern this inquiry.
sentences.cn: 《行政程序法》载有三个有可能指导事实调查的审查标准.

sentences.en: The equations defining the zero - order perturbation simply govern the static solution.
sentences.cn: 定义零 级微 扰的方程简单地决定了静态解.

sentences.en: the leaders who govern the country
sentences.cn: 治理这个国家的领导人

sentences.en: The party had been governing for seven months.
sentences.cn: 该党执政已经有七个月了。

sentences.en: The republics began asserting their right to govern themselves.
sentences.cn: 各加盟共和国开始要求获得自治权。

sentences.en: The universe is governed by the laws of physics.
sentences.cn: 宇宙受到物理法则的支配。

sentences.en: their incapacity to govern effectively
sentences.cn: 他们缺乏有效治理的能力

sentences.en: Their work includes the identification of genes which govern the growth rate and fertility.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作包括找出那些控制生长率和繁殖能力的基因。

sentences.en: You believe that human beings are not fit to govern themselves.
sentences.cn: 你们认为人类不能自己管理自己.

sentences.en: You should govern your temper.
sentences.cn: 你应该控制你的情绪.

words.tran_cn: 可控制的；可支配的；可统治的
有统治、控制或治理权力的
政府的；政治的；统治上的
主管人员；统治者，管理者；[自] 调节器；地方长官
州长或总督等的职位；州长或总督等的任期

trans.tran_en: to officially and legally control a country and make all the decisions about taxes, laws, public services etc

trans.tran_cn: 居支配地位， 占优势

trans.tran_en: to officially and legally control a country and make all the decisions about taxes, laws, public services etc
